text.text: An integrated client management function that lets you perform variety of tasks with regard to create client groups, add client accounts, view and manage all of the existing accounts with ability to send them a broadcast. Collection of all functions to help you manage the client accounts.

With MumaraSMS+ you don’t need investing time and effort to arrange required components, just focus on growing your clients while we take care of the rest. Your clients on board are empowered with client platform loaded with all required features to send and scale text messaging.

You are being provided with more than a few options to create a pricing plan that best suits your target audience/ clients. The structure is flexible enough to create and offer your client a monthly subscription packages, purchase credit plans or topup options.

Get your system to work with multiple gateways to deliver the text messages of your clients. MumaraSMS+ offers a platform integrated with globally acknowledged SMS gateways including, Twilio, Clickatell and Infobip.

Offer your client a feature rich platform to kick start the email marketing journey. MumaraESP separately maintains a client portal, where registered client accounts would use their login credentials to log into the portal. The client side offers extensive list of features for contact list management and email marketing automation.

Clients registered with MumaraESP can setup their accounts for white label sending. White label sending would enable the client account to setup its own domain for sending, as well as a bounce to mailbox to collect bounce notifications. The process of white labeling the client account is well-knitted within a step by step wizard to complete.

Set of tools and settings to effectively control, present, manage the application and monitor the email stream. Make use of white labeling function to private label the application, effectively manage the parental controls/settings and make use of support agent account for uninterrupted support to your clients and proactive monitoring of email stream.
Get Onboard to Start Your Email Service

The ESP Edition of MumaraClassic is self-hosted web application, exclusively designed for the ESPs or large enterprises. One application capable of configuring high performance email infrastructure and managing both administrative as well as the client end of the ESP. Email service providers can have the Mumara ESP installed on their webserver, can configure it with all required resources to offer email services to its clients.
The Best Decision You can make to Enhance Your Reach

Fuel your multi-channel marketing and customer communication strategy with text messaging. Create engaging text campaigns and get your text read within seconds of delivery. Reach right on your customer’s mobile with important billing reminders, service notifications and alert messages.
Welcome to Mumara App Store, it started after the immense success of the Self-Hosted edition of Mumara Email, largely accepted worldwide.
Sell Your Email Marketing Plans using MumaraClassic ESP Edition

The ESP version of MumaraClassic has made the challenging task of configuring an email infrastructure fairly easy. The seamless integration of market leader Mail Transfer Agent PowerMTA™ with all its valuable directives would help you design an infrastructure capable for high performance email delivery.

Add as many client accounts as you require and assign them a client group as per the package they have subscribed. The “Client Group” function offers access control list to control the access level of the client accounts, and resource restriction capability to limit the use of resources and sending volume according to the different client packages.

With Mumara ESP, you have the ability to add multiple IPs and IP blocks belonging to one or multiple sending servers. After having these IPs and IP blocks added in your system, you can manage them within the shared pool of IPs, can assign dedicated IPs to specific client accounts and can also keep IPs reserved for future use.
Install both themes on a site with Gatsby Theme Composition. It's a perfect match.
CMS Integrated: Strapi, Contentful, Sanity, Netlify CMS and MDX
Mumara supports cloud-based or self-hosted CMSes for writing blog posts.
Mumara delivers maximum functionality with value-added serverless APIs.
